definition: happy land/paradise
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The architectural appearance of focus plaza is a high 70 meters′Grand double sub-tower.
sentences.chinese: 福地广场为70米高的双子塔建筑外形，恢宏大气。

sentences.english: There is a new world somewhere they call the promised land.
sentences.chinese: 在某一处有一个新的世界，他们称之为福地。

sentences.english: Banished from humanity, the machines sought refuge in their own promised land.
sentences.chinese: 被人流放，机器在自己的福地寻求庇护。

sentences.english: Tianchang, now name of this land, was once a wish of an emperor of Tang Dynasty(618-907).
sentences.chinese: 这里，寄托着一个伟大王朝梦想的千秋福地。

sentences.english: The pure land of buddha was actually a good place on earth.
sentences.chinese: 名是佛国净土，实是人间福地。

sentences.english: The world was blessed place before the Fall.
sentences.chinese: 世界在人类堕落之前本是一块福地。

sentences.english: There is a world somewhere they call the promised land.
sentences.chinese: 在某一处有一个新的世界，他们称之为福地。

definition: illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
well-known scenic spot
happy place/paradise/haven
fairyland/wonderland/paradise
wonderful scenery
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
mountain of Immortals
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
see 桃花源[tao2 hua1 yuan2]
Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan/Taoyuan township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest
paradise/heavenly or beautiful place/fairyland
the Peach Blossom Spring, a hidden land of peace and prosperity/utopia
fairyland/honorific: your homeland
famous mountain/Mingshan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
